title: Definition

title: Write

title: Answer
speech: The answer is  the 3 by 4 matrix row 1 column 1 1, column 2 2, column 3 negative 1, column 4 3 row 2 column 1 2, column 2 negative 1, column 3 2, column 4 6 row 3 column 1 1, column 2 negative 3, column 3 3, column 4 4 .
